bibl.title: Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)

bibl.seg: THOMAS Richard F., "Drownded in the Tide": The Nauagika and Some "Problems" in Augustan Poetry.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 259-275, 1 tabl.
P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. xiv, 3-28 = 89-94 Austin-Bastianini.
